social_emotional.question: Does your child play next to other children?

cognitive.question: Does your child copy simple actions like sweeping?

language.question: About how many words does your child say?

motor.question: Can your child stack blocks or similar objects?

social_emotional.question: Does your child take turns during play?

cognitive.question: Does your child use objects for pretend play?

language.question: Does your child tell simple stories?

motor.question: Does your child use crayons or markers to draw?

social_emotional.question: Does your child assign roles during pretend play?

cognitive.question: Does your child plan play scenarios in advance?

language.question: Can your child have back-and-forth conversations?

motor.question: Can your child use scissors to cut paper?
